text: On 14 July 2022, Russian forces launched a missile attack on the Ukrainian city of Vinnytsia in central Ukraine. The attack killed at least 24 people, including 3 children, and injuring at least 202 others. The event has been seen as an example of a war crime.Ukraine war: 23 killed in Russian rocket attack on VinnytsiaRussian missiles kill at least 23 in Ukraine, wound over 100 ==References== Category:July 2022 events
title: July 2022 Vinnytsia missile strike
